lightning_twig.name: Crackling Imbued Twig
lightning_twig.description: An odd Y-shaped twig of unknown hardwood. Holding it makes your hair stand on end.

confusing_twig.name: Warping Imbued Twig
confusing_twig.description: An odd Y-shaped twig of unknown hardwood. Holding it makes you feel unable to concentrate.

fireball_twig.name: Burnt Imbued Twig
fireball_twig.description: An odd Y-shaped twig of unknown hardwood. A powerful heat emanates from it.

teleother_twig.name: Repelling Imbued Twig
teleother_twig.description: An odd Y-shaped twig of unknown hardwood. You often drop the twig out of unnatural clumsiness.

immolating_twig.name: Smouldering Imbued Twig
immolating_twig.description: An odd Y-shaped twig of unknown hardwood. Embers dance upon its surface.
